title: Basics of AWS Redshift
headline: This free online data management course explores Amazon Web Services (AWS) Redshift and its data warehouse services.
description: This introductory course to Amazon Web Services (AWS) Redshift explores its data warehousing services. The use of Redshift has risen steadily, creating a demand for experts who can effectively implement and manage Redshift clusters. Organizations often need to store large amounts of data securely and Redshift’s data warehouses maintain the integrity of data. Sign up to learn how to use AWS Redshift to store and manage your data in the cloud.

courseDescription:
Redshift is an Amazon Web Services (AWS) data warehouse service that stores and analyses large amounts of data in the cloud. Over the last decade, the use of Redshift has grown dramatically, as has the demand for experts who can effectively design, implement and manage Redshift clusters. This course teaches you the fundamentals of AWS Redshift. We start by explaining why data warehouses are so important to enterprise organizations and how Redshift provides immediate value. We then lay out the differences between a traditional enterprise data warehouse and Amazon Redshift.

This data management course explores the Amazon Redshift Enterprise application's column-oriented file system structures and database options, which include ETL, data transformation, data mining, data lakes and business intelligence. We describe AWS Redshift Enterprise’s best practices for cloud security, networking and identity and access management (IAM). We also go over other critical components and features like the query editor, optimizer and Redshift Spectrum, as well as the schemas and structures, SQL options and monitoring options. Finally, we explain how to select the best node and cluster deployment options that help your organisation to meet its data management needs by using Redshift.

This course is for anyone who wants to work for Amazon and is studying for an AWS exam. We focus on Redshift and show you how to get started with this popular data warehouse. The course also suits anyone who wants to migrate their data to the cloud. We also examine other AWS services and explain how they can be combined with Redshift to provide a comprehensive data management solution. Enroll today to acquire the training you need to work for Amazon and learn how Redshift’s data warehouse services can be used to store and analyze data securely in the cloud.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.details: AWS Redshift Benefits, Limitations and Query
modules.description: In this module, you will be introduced to Amazon Web Service Redshift, you will learn its benefits, limitations, and common use cases. You will also learn about Redshift pricing, query optimization, and how to deploy clusters.
topics: AWS Redshift Benefits, and Limitations - Learning Outcomes
AWS Redshift Benefits, Limitations and Use Cases
AWS Redshift Query and Performance Notes
AWS Redshift Benefits, and Limitations - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Deployment Options and HOE Deploy Query
modules.description: In this module, you will learn the deployment and backup options for Amazon Web Service Redshift, and also how to connect Microsoft Excel to Redshift as well as the properties of the Redshift spectrum.
topics: Deployment Options and HOE Deploy Query - Learning Outcomes
AWS Redshift Deployment Options and Backup
AWS Redshift Excel Connection and Cloud Watch
